Welcome WE will allow you to recover deleted WhatsApp messages by reading your notifications Notice If you have silenced a chat or watching it when the message gets deleted, you will not receive a notification so WE can\'t help in this case. \n \n WhatsDeleted can\'t recover messages that have been deleted before you installed this app. Setup This allow the app to backup your notifications and messages in case they are deleted Notification reader Enable
